chunk_text:
## Hand-Picked from  
the best of the valley
Hailing from Piluso Vineyards in the Willamette Valley AVA, these grapes were harvested during the Santiam Canyon wildfires of 2020 which have their subtle and unique mark on this wine. Fruit forward with crisp acidity, notes of smoke and oak balance each other in the background through the finish. This easy-drinking pinot pairs with just about anything. 12.8% ALC/VOL
SOLD OUT

for in-person sales only.
